title: The client lagg recently?
body:
league client had been very easy and fast for the past few patches before 8.20 and now whenever i use it, every 10 second my pc would just freeze because of it, all my cpu, disk space, gpu, and memory isnt even used to 50%, come on riot, you've made it good once, now you gonna turn it back to the 2k17 version?

oh btw, now i just got 70 seconds on norms and i couldn't even finish my rune in time. seriously riot, take a look. my specs is good enough to play BO3(even though it probably meant nothing), but for league i'm pretty confident with the specs, TBH i think your client have a higher spec than the highest spec in game lol
